title: Bug 46925Nested groups in JNDI realm with nonrecursive implementation
description: Created attachment 23420 [details]Patch which replaced the recursive method with a while loop ("memberOf Algorithm")I have modified the method getRoles in org.apache.catalina.realm.JNDIRealm in the trunk in order to use a while loop to detect nested groups (instead of the recursive method currently implemented there).The algorithm is inspired by the article "Practices in Directory Groups" found here: http://middleware.internet2.edu/dir/groups/internet2macedirgroupsbestpractices200210.htmIt avoids group slurping and handles cyclic group memberships as well.Find a patch attached.Greetings from Amsterdam, Stefan
